channel.title: Comments on: IBM-Diligent Farewell Pictures

item.title: By: Amit

item.description: I don't know. I already forgot most of them :)
item.content:encoded: I don’t know. I already forgot most of them :)

item.title: By: Eti
item.dc:creator: Eti
item.description: Beautiful! Friends are always important, parties too, and it is wonderful to begin the new way with blessings. Good Luck!
item.content:encoded:
Beautiful! Friends are always important, parties too, and it is wonderful to begin the new way with blessings.
Good Luck!
